review_title: Go for a walk and relax.
review_body: All about nature and serene. Ride bicycle from Paldang station along side the Bukhan river and you will see so much nature.

review_title: Good walking course with beautiful garden and river view.
review_body: C1 ( 2016.10.07 ) "Garden of Water" was very good walking course beside river. There was walking road and big cosmos garden. I walked alone about 30 minutes, that's very good with smell of flower and river view. Maybe there was planted another flower by season. I think. I were satisfied this area for walking.
